bio: This hat Yo-kai can make geniuses into dreamy fools. A foolish life can be more fun...but would you even realize if it were?!

soultimate.name: Ignorance Is Bliss
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own movement speed by 40% and Move Meter speed by 100% for 15 seconds.
soultimate.description: Your speed is greatly increased for a time.

name: Dummkap
